action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the apple in the freezer, the plate on the side table and the mop on the shelf.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a living room now. There are a chair, a book, a couch and a table. The book is on the table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
